duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients with care coordination and promote patient-centered healthcare delivery within McLaren Health Care and the community.
Work collaboratively with the MPP care coordination team and health plan care managers to promote optimal patient safety and quality care.
Serve as an initial contact for primary care physicians to refer patients for care coordination and care management services.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or CMA certification, 5 years experience in healthcare, understanding of Population Health Management and industry trends, familiar with initiatives of managed care health plans, knowledge of patient and community resources, Associate's Degree, Experience in a health plan or Physician Organization environment with Care Coordination, Utilization Management, disease management, and/or population health, Motivational Interviewing Training
